tables.table_title: Advantages and disadvantages of various algorithms.
rows: The method is simple and less workload
Dealing with single objective optimization problem only
The model is accurate and the method is simple
The computation is large and the computation speed is slow
The convergence speed is fast and the versatility is strong
It is more complex, easy to fall into premature convergence, and depends on the initial population
Simple structure, few parameters and strong robustness
The speed of convergence is slow and the precision of optimization is low
The global search ability is strong and the convergence speed is fast
it is easy to fall into the local optimum, and the search speed slows down later
Strong parallel search ability and easy to get out of local minimum
The convergence speed is slow and the computation is large
The training speed is fast, the efficiency is high, and the algorithm is simple
It is easy to fall into local optimal solution and poor handling of discrete optimization problems
Convergence speed is slow and parallel computing is difficult
